data.name: MyFlinders Custom Accent Colour
data.description:
Make myFlinders look beautiful! 
Changes the default accent colour on myFlinders from green to whatever you like!

Use the colour pickers below to choose the desired colours.

Created and © by Charlie McMahon 2019.

Github: https://github.com/charliekmcmahon/myflinders-css

user.name: akiba9527
user.about:
Dark Background and Light Text
A wonderful extension for Firefox to take care with eyes in general purpose.
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/dark-background-light-text/
对于 Firefox user，这个 extension 是目前最佳的护眼工具了，适用性相当高。

http://imgur.com/a/K6l3G

Color Value with my setting：
Default foreground color：#AAAAAA (grey white)
Default background color：#121212 (dark carbon)
Default link color：#E0BC2D (yellow orange)
Default visited link color：#AAAAAA
Default active link color：#3399FF (white blue)
Default selection color：#2D2D2D (light dark carbon)
===========FOR CJK USER==========
MacType 1.2016.904.0
http://www.mactype.net
MacType非公式パッチ(DirectWriteの調整)
http://silight.hatenablog.jp/entry/MacTypePatch

Droid Sans Fallback Regular11.0d11 (14.05M)
http://www.fontke.com/font/10782556/

Google Drive
MacTypeInstaller_2016_0904_0.exe
https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B_KSWbyUB7bVRkU1NzE0d2d6SG8
Mactype_ini_Droid Sans Fallback.zip
https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B_KSWbyUB7bVN0MxQk5SM3Z1Qlk
MacTypePatch_1.25.zip
https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B_KSWbyUB7bVMnY2VS1Oa3A5Tnc
===========For Chrome Users===========
CentBrowser based Chromium
https://www.centbrowser.com/
Enable/Disable DirectWrite (Mactype)
Font Style would be much smooth.

data.name: NextDoor Dark
Nation Builder Night
data.description: A dark mode skin for the new NationBuilder Radius Control Panel made using the Google Material Design 2 Dark Mode Colour Palette.

data.name: Diary.ru - new design fix
data.description: Добавляет стили на главную и служебные страницы

data.name: Fimfiction Ratings Boxifier
data.description: Brings back the old pre-Fimfiction 4.0 "boxy" ratings bar. The CSS code in this style was taken from an internet archive backup of Fimfiction before its 4.0 update, and modified to target the current site as best as possible.

data.name: Dark-10 Scrollbar
data.description: A customizable dark scrollbar to accompany the Dark-10 theme for Google Chrome or simply as a standalone scrollbar. The default settings and the buttons were made to replicate the colour scheme and shapes from the dark Windows 10 theme. FULLY WORKING ON YOUTUBE since April 26, 2019. Install style as UserCSS using Stylus or xStyle for live customization. The full theme is available on Github and the Google Chrome theme is available on the Chrome Web Store.
